website_summaries.verdict: A good beginner flute that will serve students well even as their skills advance.
pros: Cupronickel body material with nickel plated finish
French-style sculptured keys and student-friendly embouchure plate help with intonation
Plateau key style and offset G key
Great tone in the low range
Includes contoured carrying case, gloves, cleaning cloth, and cleaning rod
cons: Not recommended for individuals whose skin reacts poorly to nickel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, service and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my 7th grade daughter who has been playing for a couple years. I have been resistant to paying large amounts of money, convinced I could find an adequate flute for a reasonable price. This flute fits the bill. It is great quality and sounded great. We did have a problem with one of the keys and as everyone else has stated, the customer service was amazing to deal with. I spoke with Enrique who was very prompt and helpful, offering a completely satisfying resolution without any hassle! It's refreshing to deal with a company that stands behind their products and serves their customers respectfully!
customer_reviews.author: Time to Rate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item works excellent for my 12 year old son who is in the school band. His band instructor was impressed. It also includes a quite sturdy case with the Jean Paul insignia. Excellent quality excellent sound and great price!! Totally surpass my expectations. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Florence M

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be great, but it's not
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flute as an upgrade to a cheap one once he knew our kiddo would stick with the flute. We've taken it in twice for repairs-and have been told this is one step up from disposal type. Even with the silver plated head joint and a nice sound, leaks keep popping up and it's frustrating for a talented player who needs the full spectrum of keys. If you can afford it, get a different one. It's a beautiful flute, but it isn't lasting and for $200 I thought we'd get several years out of it and we are really disappointed that it's as wimpy as the $90 we bought originally.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great student-intermediate flute
customer_reviews.text: Good quality music flute, especially for the price. I recommend it to my students. Obviously if you're a really serious player or pursuing a career in music you'll eventually want something better, but this is a flute that could definitely last through high school.
customer_reviews.author: Charl

customer_reviews.title: The tune of the instrument.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute from Jean Paul because I have a clarinet of the same brand that has a perfect tuning. The flute is sold for students who can't tune it. When I tried the flute, I didn't get the right note. Contact Jean Paul Technical Service. The technician, to give the correct note, had to remove the tube from the nozzle 5/8 inch. A student does not know how to tune the instrument and less move the pieces for tuning. As it was for my great-granddaughter, I had to return her.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Best for lower notes.
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews mention that this flute does best for the lower notes, and I agree. It may simply be due to the fact that I have only been playing for 6 weeks now, but I certainly have a much easier time playing notes in the lower register. Using a tuner, I can get perfect tones on notes C4 through C6, and I need practice in order to achieve better results in the higher notes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: i was shocked when i opened the case!
customer_reviews.text: i love this instrument! the details are beautiful and there were no leaks, no loose brackets, and the sound is very very good for the price. the case is lovely with space enough for a compartment to keep the warranty and cleaning pieces. i played alto sax in my high school band. i thought it would be fun to try flute because of the lockdown. im so glad i purchased this beginner flute! i have always enjoyed making music so i am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thebranchise2k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, quality, and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This flute has been wonderful for my daughter. The school said not to order from Amazon but even her teacher commented on the good quality and how nice her flute is. In addition, she's had it for quite some time now and somehow ended up with a damaged foot piece. I found their website and as it was within a year of purchase they repaired it free of charge and and covered return shipping, as well. Quick great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ameg

customer_reviews.title: Nice tone & good value for price (versus renting an instrument)
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy that we purchased this flute. As a beginner, it has been a great instrument for my son. Has nice tone and is a good quality for the price you would pay to rent an instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm a strictly amateur flute player (flautist is for professionals). I had to replace my ancient Gemeinhardt flute because I recently had a lung transplant and didn't want to breath in bacteria and who knows what else. Although I'm a little rusty, I was able to assess the quality -- and it was good. I'll know how good when I try to play Ave Maria. Well worth the modest price! Looks beautiful. Customer support was terrific. I had a question over the holidays and I got a same-day reply.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fumo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound and easy to play.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played a flute in about 20 years. I am very much out of practice. This flute played better in my rusty hands with a cleaner tone than any flute I've ever played. I was worried after that long a period of not playing, but it's very forgiving to the inexperienced, or out of practice. Beautiful sound. It arrived VERY fast. It is a truly wonderful instrument at a very good price. Also has a nice case and proper cleaning tools included. VERY good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Foxx F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted instrument
customer_reviews.text: The flute is the answer to my dreams of playing again. This is a replacement for a flute that I played for many years. The quality of the finish (silver plating) is beautiful. This instrument is very easy to play, good tone and has great response to changing notes. Lower register is rich, and high register easy to play and bright. I know I will enjoy playing this instrument for a long time to come! I would recommend this to anyone from beginner to the more experienced player. Great quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: TenzVi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service for a beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my 11 year old daughter to begin learning flute. It's been great. The most important thing to me however, beside the sound quality which is lovely, has been the incredible customer service. Her flute came without a cleaning rod. I emailed Jean Paul and they sent me one right away. A month or so later my daughter's teacher told me there was a leaky key, I emailed customer support again and they responded within an hour to let me know they were sending me a new flute! These people truly stand behind their instruments and we are so happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Delsa Slaugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing instrument and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This flute is amazing! The quality is worth more than they sell it for. It's truly a beautiful instrument and the sound is as beautiful as it looks. Mine was missing the protective caps. I reached out to Jean Paul USA, and Tim got back to me and told me he will ship them out ASAP. I will definitely recommend this flute for anyone, student or not. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Flute seems to be very well made and has a very nice sound. The carry case is nice with a snug fit that helps prevent flute from accidentally falling out. Nice tool kit for cleaning and gloves to help keep fingerprints to a minimum. Overall, very pleased with purchase and for the price the flute is a great value and should offer many years of enjoyment. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: Good flute to start learning with. Makes a nice sound after a little practice. Glad I bought a cleaning/maintenance kit to go with the flute because putting it together was very hard at first due to no grease on the joints. After applying some grease the flute is easy to put together. Comes with a soft case that will protect it from drops. I think it has good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already leaking
customer_reviews.text: Only used this for a month and it already leaks. Took it in to get repaired and because we bought it on amazon no one has parts to fix it. 200 dollars wasted
customer_reviews.author: A. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.  Great instrument for the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with the sound of the flute. Customer service is excellent, had a little bit of a loose fit on the head and they sent us out a new one right away that fits snug and sounds great. We were trying to avoid spending $600+ on a flute or a buying a used one but needed something that would sound good and work well for my daughter in her high school marching band. This fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Comben III

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument, sounds and looks just like the Yamaha that I was renting. The valves feel really smooth as well. One benefit is that it's new and no previous owner especially during COVID-19.
customer_reviews.author: Pollaso

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy, smooth and all round great sound. I recommend it for a serious intermediate student.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an entry level instrument to learn how to plat the flute.. thus far, after 2-3 months, it’s working out well.. the company also has excellent customer service.. they helped me to replace a part that fell off the flute.
customer_reviews.author: H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Jran Paul flute for student
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent for me. I'll be studing and enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: King-Kong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for beginners. A+ product. Music Teacher recommended for my son. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Max Tim Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good flute for this price
customer_reviews.text: A good flute for beginners. The case doesn’t quite fit the flute so when you open it the flute tends to fall out. The joints are a bit tight so joint grease is needed. Sound quality is good. A good flute for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Herbst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value/quality
customer_reviews.text: After trying to relearn instrument from 45 yrs ago, I am delighted at the sound & ease of play on this flute. I’m so happy I purchased a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for Jr high band
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sort of complains that it's not as nice as the $500 rental, but hey.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Sucks

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not a long term flute.
customer_reviews.text: Decent flute but is fairly low quality. Some smaller parts seemed cheap. Wound up sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beginner flutist
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been using a 25+ yr old flute and this was a DRASTIC improvement! Sounds quality is great! Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good Marching Flute
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound and easy to snap into place while marching. I use this as my marching flute because it is a great value and is closed holed which my band teacher prefers. I would highly recommend this to any new flutes or any flutes looking to find a nice marching flute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this flute for our daughter who is starting her first year of band. We are very excited to see her grow. Customer service is great with answering questions and respond quickly in attempting to meet your needs. We will buy again next year with a trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me want to play the flute all the time! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the feel & sound if this flute. The carry bag is very nice as well. The flute is also very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flute for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute for my daughter since she joined the school band. It seemed nicely made and good weight for the price range. However a small piece of it loosened and my daughter was unable to press some keys. I called customer service and they took care of the issue right away which was great. I would buy another flute from them again.
customer_reviews.author: wdw

customer_reviews.title: Jean Paul flute
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful instrument for beginners, it comes with the case and the cleaning kit. My daughter loved it so much even her teacher liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Abeer Sh.

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute for Beginner to Intermediate Flute Players
customer_reviews.text: This flute has been an exception, exceeding my expectations. For a price of 180$ to 210$, this flute sounds like an 1000$+ flute. Great product, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zetian Ren

customer_reviews.title: Quality instrument and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this flute, and I love the service. It's always a little scary buying a musical instrument online, but Jean Paul stands behind their products and that takes a load off my mind. We had a minor issue with the flute and they took care of it right away!
customer_reviews.author: David Klein

customer_reviews.title: Nice flute
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old uses this for school and loves it! Great quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ciulla

customer_reviews.title: Great for young students
customer_reviews.text: My son is loving this flute. I got this after a more expensive flute being damaged by accident. This is less expensive and better than the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Like flute very much.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 11 y.o. granddaughter that is just learning to play flute. Perfect for a beginner. Well made flute and case. I'd recommend this flute if you are unsure of the person's dedication to playing flute.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: A very nice flute for beginner or intermediate musician
customer_reviews.text: A good investment foe younger musicians. This flute plays well, is well constructed and comes with a very nice case. Recommended for beginners or intermediate players.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price!!! My son loves this instrument!
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely amazing. This product is well worth the purchase and the shipping was 4 days early and arrived on a Sunday. I am extremely happy with this and I would definitely recommend. The quality of this product is also very nice and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Vegemite

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything came great, flute looked very nice. Plays well, only issue being the keys are a bit sticky and the tone is a little airy, but it was about what I was expecting from a cheap instrument. I only purchased this to have a home instrument to play every once in a while so it does its job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It is a good piece of instrument
customer_reviews.text: My daugher's school band teacher is happy with the quality of this flute. There is really no need to spend big bucks for a name brand flute for flute beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for lessons
customer_reviews.text: We rented one last year & it was pretty worn. After talking with teacher, he suggested buying this one & pointed out that it's only about $60 more then the yearly rental fee.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Deskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality, better than most surprisingly, except...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was nice, easy to use for beginners or anyone else seeking to buy a cheap flute with good quality sound. Everything was fine except that the flute case came with broken zippers and I tried calling many times but no one would pick up the phone, the instrument was fine, but needs to work on the case.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner flute.
customer_reviews.text: That was a good beginner flute, there were no missing materials, but the low C was not coming out that's why I returned it, but other note sounds were so good, and the tone was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: Quality instrument at a fraction of the cost for more high end instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: Flute
customer_reviews.text: Good student flute had since July only thing is the finish is already coming off
customer_reviews.author: LaRisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Beginner flute purchased for middle schooler beginner flute class. Absolutely. no complaints. It even arrives in quality wrapping and the carrying case in a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Great intermediate flute
customer_reviews.text: Lovely flute. Looks beautiful and plays beautifully, as well. Has a nice tone, although I had to extend, or had to pull the mouthpiece out a little bit to be in tune with my daughters guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Roman

customer_reviews.title: very happy chilf
customer_reviews.text: looks and sounds great. my daughter will be very happy to receive this
customer_reviews.author: ascharer

customer_reviews.title: Flute for the beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a beginner. The sound quality is good. However the color started fading after few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AROCKS

customer_reviews.title: Nice flute, no cleaning rod.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who wants to learn to play the flute. It’s a nice flute and case except it did not include the cleaning rod. Other than that she is delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roop

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the delivery of the instrument. The quality and sound of the flute was great too! My son agreed. Thanks for the wonderful experience. I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah G Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great flute for students
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to play in her middle school band. She is now in her high school band and still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RFL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great service and a great warranty to go with it, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Houseman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it! Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Holehan

customer_reviews.title: For this payment it is a good product, it is satisfying the expectations of the ...
customer_reviews.text: For this payment it is a good product, it is satisfying the expectations of the teacher and the son is happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case needs to sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I don't have issue with flute. Case is really bad. Zipper keep falling off and breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Great Flute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good flute to play and sounds nice
customer_reviews.author: MiguelAngel R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while now and it still sounds pretty. highly recommend this if you are in school or a casual player
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Flute
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, kid loves it and classmates are asking about it. School music teacher approved!
customer_reviews.author: Jan B.

customer_reviews.title: great flute, I've really enjoyed learning how to play.
customer_reviews.text: great flute, great tone, great price. Should be purchased with essential elements book for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: tyler long

customer_reviews.title: Jean Paul USA flute
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to flute. I would recommend for anyone who wants to learn.
customer_reviews.author: vishal

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...terrible quality 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: The flute stopped working in less than 6 months....really disappointing. Had to add a star since it is a required field...or else would’ve given 0 stars Update:contacted Amazon and they are processing a refund for me. Really appareciate how amazon takes care of their customers!!! Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received her flute as a birthday gift. It arrived today and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Great flute and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flute in mid December loved it great quality my old flute teacher greatly approved the warranty is great however i damaged my flute by accident which was not covered by the warranty but after contacting jean paul they were more then happy to help me by providing me with a new flute To me this speaks volumes of the company Im most defiantly gonna buy more instruments from this company
customer_reviews.author: cristian rosales

customer_reviews.title: The flute is great, but we had issues with the zipper breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flute for our seventh grader. The flute is great, but we had issues with the zipper breaking on the carrying case. I contacted Jean Paul USA, and a new bag was shipped the next day. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Oneills75

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: i have used this 2 month and that is enough for beginners, i guess that you don't need more ...
customer_reviews.author: Semih Taner Ayhan

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 30 days. Parent to Parent ..Spend the extra $$$ on the Yamaha or Gemeinhardt
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 30 days. Parent to Parent ..Spend the extra $$$ on the Yamaha or Gemeinhardt
customer_reviews.author: Larnell

customer_reviews.title: and this one really made her happy. The teacher even remarked what a nice instrument ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this flute for our 9 yo daughter to start lessons. She's been asking for a flute for a long time, and this one really made her happy. The teacher even remarked what a nice instrument it was: great sound, great case. We thought about renting, but when you look at the cost, it's a much nicer instrument and about the same money. So everyone's happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flute.
customer_reviews.text: This flute is really nice. The sound quality is so Great. My 11 years old daughter really love and enjoy playing it. 😀😀😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Did not pass instrument inspection
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it since my daughter's band teacher didn't approve of its quality. Their main concern is the buttons will break. Even though Jean Paul's service was really good with my other daughter's clarinet, I'd rather not take any chances with the flute.
customer_reviews.author: ChristCenteredGamer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This flute has been great. Originally I had to send it back to be fixed since there was a problem with the notes. However, it was fixed at no cost and has gotten tons of use since purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Returned, customers Beware,
customer_reviews.text: Returned, customers Beware, if you have a nickel allergy the Embrusur May make your mouth sore
customer_reviews.author: Spangles

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a product I would recommend at all!!! My daughter has been only using this 2 months at home and now when she is to start band at school come to find out there are a bunch of things wrong with it. Took it to see and first it is made of nickel which is really bad, made in China, and really expensive to fix. Now i am out of the money I paid and Amazon won't return it not even for credit.:((((((
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jean Paul USA Silver Plated Flute (FL-220)
product_meta.description: Style:StudentThe Jean Paul FL-220 flute is a beautifully silver Plated constructed instrument that is easy to play and designed specifically for students who are beginner/intermediate flutist musicians. Power-forged keys on the FL-220 ensure durability and even response while French-style sculptured keys and a student-friendly embouchure plate help make it an easy to play flute with great intonation. The flute's C foot, plateau key-style and offset-g key also facilitate holding and playing for younger students. That's why the Jean Paul FL-220 flute is the best in its class: durability, ease of play and outstanding sound.
feature_bullets: Power-forged keys for durability and even response
Student-friendly embouchure plate for great intonation and ease of play
Beautiful cupronickel Body material with silver-plated finish
Comes with robust contoured carrying case for ease of use transportation
Included accessories: Carrying Case, cleaning Cloth, and cleaning rod

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Instrument Key: The Jean Paul Flute is in key of C
